text: Dominique Kalifa (12 September 1957 – 12 September 2020) was a French historian, educator and columnist. He was born in Vichy, France. Kalifa was professor at the University of Paris 1 Pantheon-Sorbonne. He was a member of the Institut Universitaire de France. He was also taught at the Institut d'Etudes Politiques de Paris (Sciences Po) from 2008 to 2015, and was several times visiting scholar at New York University and the University of Saint Andrews. From 1990, he was also a columnist (historical reviews) for the French newspaper Libération. Kalifa killed himself on his 63rd birthday on 12 September 2020. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Academics of Paris universities Category:French journalists Category:French historians Category:Suicides Category:People from Allier Category:Writers from Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes
